# Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

## Solicitation Information
* Solicitation Number: 23-225100
* Date of Publication: May 24, 2023
* Closing Date: July 21, 2023 at 14:00:00

## Tender Description
This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) solicitation is being issued to satisfy the requirements of the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) for a Departmental Internal Standing Offer (DISO) method of supply.

The Government of Canada intends to award up to 50 standing offers for a period of one year, with two irrevocable options for a one-year extension. The selected suppliers will provide private investigation services as per the solicitation requirements.

## Security Requirements
There are security requirements associated with this solicitation. Suppliers must consult Part 6 - Security, Financial, and Other Requirements, and Part 7 – Resulting Contract Clauses for more information. Personnel and organization security screening or security clauses are handled by the Contract Security Program of Public Works and Government Services Canada.

## Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the provisions of various international trade agreements, including the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and others.

## Employment Equity
The Federal Offeror’s Program (FCP) for employment equity applies to this procurement.

## Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the solicitation and attachments, can be downloaded from the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website.

## Contact Information
